MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK4 postcode area of Bonnybridge. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:00pm to safely carry out repairs to our electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:28pm on Wednesday, 24 March 2021
